info.name: Energy Solutions API
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for Energy Solutions Backend with authentication, user management, and admin functionalities

exec: // Also store as general accessToken for collection-level auth
// Also store as general user variables
// Also store as general accessToken for collection-level auth

request.description: Creates a new service with images that will be automatically uploaded to Appwrite storage. External URLs will be downloaded and stored in Appwrite, while file uploads can be handled using form-data (see 'Create Service with File Upload' request).

formdata.value: Professional solar panel installation for residential and commercial properties
Our expert team provides comprehensive solar panel installation services with 10+ years of experience.

formdata.description: Main service image file - will be uploaded to Appwrite storage
Additional gallery images - multiple files can be selected

request.description: Creates a new service with file uploads. Images will be automatically uploaded to Appwrite storage and URLs will be generated. Use this for direct file uploads instead of external URLs.
Updates an existing service. External image URLs will be downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage automatically. Use 'Update Service with File Upload' for direct file uploads.

formdata.description: New main service image - will replace existing image in Appwrite
New gallery images - will replace existing gallery

request.description: Updates an existing service with file uploads. New images will be uploaded to Appwrite storage and old images may be replaced.

formdata.value: Complete solar panel installation for residential property with modern technology and battery backup system

formdata.description: Main project image (JPG, PNG, WEBP up to 10MB) - will be uploaded to Appwrite storage
Additional project images (up to 10 files) - all will be uploaded to Appwrite storage

request.description: Creates a new project with file uploads. All images will be automatically uploaded to Appwrite storage and URLs will be generated.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Commercial Solar Installation - Blantyre",
  "client": "XYZ Corporation",
  "description": "Large-scale commercial solar installation with advanced monitoring system and battery backup for office complex",
  "category": "commercial",
  "status": "completed",
  "startDate": "2024-02-01",
  "endDate": "2024-02-15",
  "duration": "2 weeks",
  "location": {
    "city": "Blantyre",
    "district": "Blantyre",
    "country": "Malawi"
  },
  "images": {
    "featured": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1508514177221-188b1cf16e9d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1200&q=80",
    "gallery": [
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559302504-64aae6ca6b6d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80",
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1466611653911-95081537e5b7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80",
      "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1497440001374-f26997328c1b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80"
    ]
  },
  "technologies": ["High-Efficiency Solar Panels", "String Inverters", "Monitoring System", "Battery Storage"],
  "teamSize": 8,
  "projectValue": {
    "amount": 150000,
    "currency": "MWK",
    "displayPublicly": true
  },
  "challenges": "Complex roof structure required custom mounting solutions",
  "solutions": "Designed and fabricated custom mounting brackets for optimal panel placement",
  "outcomes": ["40% reduction in electricity costs", "15kW system capacity", "10-year warranty coverage"],
  "isPublished": true
}

request.description: Creates a new project using external image URLs. All external URLs will be automatically downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage for consistency and reliability.
Updates an existing project. External image URLs will be downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage automatically. Use 'Update Project with File Upload' for direct file uploads.

formdata.description: New main project image - will replace existing image in Appwrite
New gallery images - will replace existing gallery

formdata.value: ["45% reduction in electricity costs", "15kW system capacity", "10-year warranty coverage", "Remote monitoring enabled"]

request.description: Updates an existing project with file uploads. New images will be uploaded to Appwrite storage.

formdata.value: Experienced solar technician with 5+ years in renewable energy systems. Specialized in residential and commercial installations with expertise in system design and troubleshooting.

formdata.description: Profile image file (JPG, PNG, WEBP up to 10MB) - will be uploaded to Appwrite storage
Cover image file (optional) - will be uploaded to Appwrite storage

formdata.value: [{"degree":"Electrical Engineering","institution":"University of Malawi","year":2018},{"degree":"Solar Energy Certificate","institution":"Energy Institute","year":2020}]

request.description: Creates a new staff member with file uploads. Profile and cover images will be automatically uploaded to Appwrite storage and URLs will be generated.

body.raw:
{
  "firstName": "Jane",
  "lastName": "Smith",
  "displayName": "Jane Smith",
  "email": "jane.smith@energysolutions.mw",
  "phone": "+265999654321",
  "position": "Project Manager",
  "department": "management",
  "bio": "Experienced project manager with expertise in renewable energy projects. Leads cross-functional teams to deliver solar installations on time and within budget.",
  "profileImage": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b5bc?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80",
  "coverImage": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1497440001374-f26997328c1b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1200&q=80",
  "joinedDate": "2023-06-15",
  "qualifications": [
    {
      "degree": "Project Management",
      "institution": "University of Malawi",
      "year": 2019
    },
    {
      "degree": "PMP Certification",
      "institution": "PMI",
      "year": 2021
    }
  ],
  "skills": ["Project Management", "Team Leadership", "Budget Management", "Risk Assessment", "Client Relations"],
  "yearsOfExperience": 6,
  "socialLinks": {
    "linkedin": "https://linkedin.com/in/janesmith",
    "facebook": "https://facebook.com/janesmith"
  },
  "achievements": ["Led 50+ successful solar installations", "Reduced project timelines by 20%", "Client satisfaction rate of 98%"],
  "specializations": ["Commercial Solar Projects", "Team Management", "Client Relations"],
  "languages": ["English", "Chichewa"],
  "status": "active",
  "isTeamLead": true,
  "isFeatured": true,
  "isPublished": true
}

request.description: Creates a new staff member using external image URLs. All external URLs will be automatically downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage for consistency and reliability.

body.raw:
{
  "position": "Lead Solar Technician",
  "bio": "Senior solar technician with 6+ years in renewable energy systems. Recently promoted to team lead with expertise in training junior staff and managing complex installations.",
  "profileImage": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80",
  "yearsOfExperience": 6,
  "achievements": ["Completed 100+ installations", "Zero safety incidents", "Mentored 10+ junior technicians"],
  "isTeamLead": true,
  "isFeatured": true
}

request.description: Updates an existing staff member. External image URLs will be downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage automatically. Use 'Update Staff with File Upload' for direct file uploads.

formdata.value: Senior solar technician with 6+ years in renewable energy systems. Recently promoted to team lead.

formdata.description: New profile image - will replace existing image in Appwrite
New cover image - will replace existing image in Appwrite

request.description: Updates an existing staff member with file uploads. New images will be uploaded to Appwrite storage.

body.raw:
{
  "content": "Exceptional service! The solar installation exceeded our expectations. The team was professional, knowledgeable, and completed the project ahead of schedule. Our electricity bills have been reduced by 60% and the system works flawlessly.",
  "rating": 5,
  "author": {
    "name": "Jane Smith",
    "position": "Operations Manager",
    "company": "ABC Manufacturing Ltd",
    "email": "jane.smith@abcmanufacturing.com",
    "phone": "+265999123456",
    "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b5bc?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80"
  },
  "type": "text",
  "project": "{{projectId}}",
  "service": "{{serviceId}}",
  "tags": ["solar", "commercial", "efficiency"],
  "source": "Direct Contact",
  "socialProof": {
    "platform": "LinkedIn",
    "profileUrl": "https://linkedin.com/in/janesmith"
  },
  "isFeatured": true,
  "status": "pending"
}

request.description: Creates a new testimonial with author image URL. External image URLs will be automatically downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage for reliability.

formdata.value: Outstanding solar installation service! The team was professional and the results are amazing. Our energy costs have been cut in half.

formdata.description: Author profile image - will be uploaded to Appwrite storage
Additional media (video/audio) - will be uploaded to Appwrite storage

request.description: Creates a new testimonial with file uploads. Author image and media files will be automatically uploaded to Appwrite storage.
Updates an existing testimonial. External image URLs will be downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage automatically. Use 'Update Testimonial with File Upload' for direct file uploads.

formdata.value: Updated: Outstanding solar installation service! The team exceeded expectations and delivered exceptional results.

formdata.description: New author profile image - will replace existing image in Appwrite
New media file - will replace existing media in Appwrite

request.description: Updates an existing testimonial with file uploads. New images and media will be uploaded to Appwrite storage.

formdata.description: Optional slide title
Landing slide image (JPG, PNG, WEBP up to 10MB) - will be uploaded to Appwrite storage

formdata.value: {"alt":"Professional solar panel installation on residential roof"}
formdata.description: Image alt text and other media properties

request.description: Creates a new landing slide with file upload. Image will be automatically uploaded to Appwrite storage and URL will be generated.
Creates a new landing slide using external image URL. External URL will be automatically downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage for reliability.
Updates an existing slide. External image URLs will be downloaded and stored in Appwrite storage automatically. Use 'Update Slide with File Upload' for direct file uploads.

formdata.description: New slide image - will replace existing image in Appwrite

request.description: Updates an existing slide with file upload. New image will be uploaded to Appwrite storage.

  "name": "John Doe",
